name: Lost Scepter - Echoes of the Deep
name_original: Lost Scepter - Echoes of the Deep
description:
Genre: Walking Simulator (Diving Simulator)

Language: English

PC Game, Windows

Single Player

Description:

Something lies at the bottom of the sea. Take a dive into this world and find out what happened here.

Controls:

Mouse and keyboard only

WASD for movement directions

Mouse for view direction

Shift for sprint

E for interaction

Team: Snorkel Squad

Laura Winkel

Leonard Sabbagh

Khira Niemeier
